usage_instructions.step_1: First, review this index to understand available API modules
usage_instructions.step_2: Identify which module(s) are relevant to the user's request based on keywords and descriptions
usage_instructions.step_3: Request the detailed documentation for only the relevant module(s) using the 'file' path
usage_instructions.step_4: Use the detailed documentation to construct appropriate API calls
